imdb.title: Nanatsu no taizai
imdb.plot: The story of the Seven Deadly Sins, a group of warriors who were wrongly accused of a crime they didn't commit and went on a quest to vindicate themselves.

episodes.title: From Purgatory
episodes.plot: Ban searches Purgatory for Meliodas. King, Derieri, and the others head to Heaven's Theater to rescue Elizabeth, who's been abducted by Estarossa.

episodes.title: A Meeting with the Unknown
episodes.plot: Ban and Meliodas tries to escape from the purgatory while the others face the hurdle of Zeldris

episodes.title: One thought
episodes.plot: Meliodas tells a backstory of his brother, Zeldris. Ludociel and Escanor try to find a way to break Ominous Nebula.

episodes.title: Impromptu meeting
episodes.plot: Estarrosa's true identity is revealed as a result of memory revival of all connected to him. Meanwhile the stigma group continues their fight against the high ranked demons.

episodes.title: The tragic blow
episodes.plot: Gowther reveals that his creator, the real Gowther, cast a forbidden spell on Mael and all those who knew him to end the Holy War 3,000 years ago.

episodes.title: Stand up against despair
episodes.plot: Gowther takes on Mael to defend his friends. Diane also joins the battle, but the Archangel's power level continues to rise as he nears his final form.

episodes.title: Hope, Discord and Despair
episodes.plot: Mael changes form after absorbing four of the Commandments. King soon overwhelms him with his Spirit Spear, but Gowther tries to save the Archangel.

episodes.title: The Doorway To Hope
episodes.plot: Meliodas and the others have to defeat the Demon King before they can escape Purgatory and make their way to the world of the living.

episodes.title: That Which Gathers
episodes.plot: Chandler and Cusack merge to form the all-powerful Original Demon. Merlin gives up any hope of victory, but Mael and King soon come to her aid.

episodes.title: The Salvation Of The Sun
episodes.plot: As Meliodas absorbs every last one of the Ten Commandments, Merlin attempts a forbidden spell to stop the birth of a new Demon King.

episodes.title: The One Who Stands Against a God
episodes.plot: Merlin's spell thwarts Meliodas' transformation. The Holy War seems to be over, but Elizabeth senses something is still terribly wrong.

episodes.title: Everyone Will Be Your Strength
episodes.plot: Escaping Purgatory, Ban faces the Demon King, who now possesses Meliodas' body. Elizabeth and the others make their way into the spirit world.

episodes.title: The End of a Long Journey
episodes.plot: Peace returns to the Kingdom of Liones. Although Elizabeth is still under a curse, Meliodas assured her there is a way to break it.

episodes.title: Farewell, Seven Deadly Sins
episodes.plot: Now that Meliodas is the Demon King, he cannot remain on earth. Though his friends acknowledge his fate, they are unable to accept it.

episodes.title: Fated Brothers
episodes.plot: Merlin rescues Elizabeth, who was on her way to the Demon Realm with Meliodas. The Sins realize the Demon King is alive.

episodes.title: The Final Battle
episodes.plot: Elizabeth and Meliodas face the Demon King, who now possesses the body of Zeldris.

episodes.title: The Voice That Calls Your Name
episodes.plot: With Escanor's aid, Meliodas and Gowther reach the Spirit World, where they aim to split the Demon King and Zeldris back into their own bodies.

episodes.title: The King Sings Alone
episodes.plot: Escanor continues to battle with the Demon King at full power as Diane looks to destroy the source of his magic.

episodes.title: The Struggle
episodes.plot: Escanor converts all of his life energy into magic to defeat the Demon King.

episodes.title: Mortal Enemies
episodes.plot: Zeldris and the Sins corner the Demon King in both realms, but the King separates from his son's body and possesses Britannia itself as his new vessel.

episodes.title: What the Witch was Always After
episodes.plot: The long-fought Holy War comes to a dramatic end. Peace returns to the Kingdom of Britannia once again, but a new threat looms on the horizon.

episodes.title: A Fragment of Chaos
episodes.plot: The Sins are shocked by Merlin's longtime deception. Meanwhile, Merlin declares that Arthur has been recognised as the King of Chaos.

episodes.title: An Everlasting Kingdom
episodes.plot: A vicious beast in its true form, Cath attacks the reawakened Arthur. Now separated from the Sins, Merlin attempts to take on the monster herself.

episodes.title: Heirs
episodes.plot: All the Sins get on with their lives, having a reunion on the 10th birthday of Meliodas and Elizabeth's son Tristan.

episodes.title: The Light That Disperses Darkness
episodes.plot: The demons are collecting human souls, whilst Estarossa is recovering from the battle with Escanor. Pelio discovers that humans are being given to the demons, who are defeated by Meliodas. The King chooses the next Great Holy Knight.

episodes.title: Memories of the Holy War
episodes.plot: Dark memories are beginning to appear.

episodes.title: Those Without Light
episodes.plot: Aware they need to complete their trial, King and Diane vow to come back and help Meliodas and Elizabeth. They are lead to the base of Stigma. Then the Ten Commandments arrive to the battlefield where the Four Archangels await.

episodes.title: The Ten Commandments vs. The Four Archangels
episodes.plot: Enraged by the events demons attack but Sariel and Tarmiel show up and wipe out a large number of them in an instant. But they are overpowered and Ludociel joins the battle. Gowther and Melascula enter the Stigma headquarters to take over Nerobasta and stop the the goddesses from sending reinforcements to the battle.

episodes.title: Emotional Maelstrom
episodes.plot: As Elizabeth succeeds in pushing back the indura form Gowther and Melascula are upto something in stigma headquarters, amidst of that Round and other humans attacks and kills everyone in stigma. As the gates open a person appears and gowther starts behaving differently..

episodes.title: We Call That Love
episodes.plot: Diane learns of the back-story of Gowther and makes a promise. King faces his final test in the realm and must make a crucial choice that Gloxinia faced 3000 years ago.

episodes.title: Deadly Sins Unite!
episodes.plot: Diane in the form of Drone goes against Zeldris the executioner but soon she realises his magnitude of power. After passing the test Diane and King unite with the rest of the sins.

episodes.title: The Doll Seeks Love
episodes.plot: Gowther's past memories resurface as he is reminded by the magical heart given to him by his master. Desperate to forget them, Gowther flees and tries to erase his memories, but The Seven Deadly Sins won't make it easy for him to do so.

episodes.title: The Cursed Lovers
episodes.plot: Merlin starts looking for Arthur but is trapped by Zeldris. Sins celebrate to their reunion but Elizabeth seems to be worried when Diane tells her about goddess Elizabeth. Merlin's condition is worsened but Elizabeth cures her and in that brief time she meets Zeldris who tells her something which in turn makes Meliodas extremely worried.

episodes.title: That Is Our Way of Life
episodes.plot: Sins come to know about the tragic lives of Meliodas and Elizabeth. They decide to go to the walled city of Coland where none other than Zeldris shows up...

episodes.title: The Hateful Cannot Rest
episodes.plot: The party heads to the city of Coland to dispel the distortion protecting Camelot. When Meliodas is trapped in darkness, they must fight without him.

episodes.title: Love is a Maiden's Power
episodes.plot: Trapped in Melascula's magic, Meliodas breaks the magic at the cost of his emotions. Out of cocoon comes a very different Meliodas who will be confronted by the mightiest of the sin.

episodes.title: The Almighty vs. the Greatest Evil
episodes.plot: As things have escalated quickly this will be the final showdown among the strongest to prove who is better WRATH or PRIDE...

episodes.title: A New Threat
episodes.plot: Meliodas still unconscious after the fight with escanor, while Chandler proceeds to claim back his old student..

episodes.title: To Our Captain
episodes.plot: The Sins have a fight with Chandler. They force him to reveal his true monstrous self. At the last moment the old Fairy King Gloxinia and the old Giant King Drole come to their aid. They buy the Sins time to escape.

episodes.title: The Seven Deadly Sins End
episodes.plot: Gloxinia and Drole are defeated by The Demonic Chandler. Meliodas rises from his sleep and announces that Seven Deadly Sins are disbanded now.

episodes.title: Our Choices
episodes.plot: Meliodas returns to Zeldris and gives some new orders. The 7 Deadly Sins realize something about Hawk. Ban makes a bold decision to save his friend.

episodes.title: March of the Saints
episodes.plot: Merlin faces Zeldris, whom Meliodas has ordered to gather the commandments. Margaret, Hendrickson and Dreyfus continue their search for Gilthunder.

episodes.title: The Holy War Accord
episodes.plot: Having taken over Margaret's body, Ludociel appears in Liones and declares a holy war against the Demon Clan. Meliodas and Chandler search for Elizabeth.

episodes.title: Child of Hope
episodes.plot: In Camelot, Arthur searches for the Holy Sword Excalibur alone. Ludociel warns Escanor to give up his grace of sunshine.

episodes.title: Beginning of the Holy War
episodes.plot: Inside Camelot, Arthur makes his last stand against Meliodas and the others. Merlin comes to his rescue, but not before she falls under Cusack's spell.

episodes.title: War-torn Britannia
episodes.plot: The new Holy War commences as the allied forces of the Stigma face off against the Demon Clan. Derieri decides to surrender her commandment to Zeldris.

episodes.title: The One Twisted by Darkness
episodes.plot: Sensing Elizabeth's Magic, Derieri appears before the Stigma army. Estarossa follows her but Sariel and Tarmiel have other plans for him.

episodes.title: Rampaging Love
episodes.plot: Estarossa professes his love for Elizabeth. When he loses control after absorbing three commandments, Stigma's army faces him in a final battle.

episodes.title: Imashime no fukkatsu
episodes.plot: As the kingdom begins to rebuild, the king honors the seven deadly sins for their bravery with a medal ceremony.

episodes.title: Existence and Proof
episodes.plot: With Fraudrin's manipulation of Hendrickson, the ten commandments return to the physical realm. King follows Ban to the Fairy King's forest.

episodes.title: Sacred Treasure Lostvayne
episodes.plot: Diane confronts Gowther after he manipulates Guila and Zeal's memories. with the return of the Demon Clan, new threats descend upon allied clans.

episodes.title: The Ten Commandments on the Move
episodes.plot: King struggles to fend off the giant Albion sent to destroy the Fairy King's forest. Galand of the ten commandments appears before Meliodas.

episodes.title: Overwhelming Violence
episodes.plot: Galand, the truth of the ten commandments gets teleported to The Seven Deadly Sins. After his overwhelming power is revealed, Merlin realizes how terrifying the situation is.

episodes.title: The Atoning Great Holy Knight
episodes.plot: Hendrickson thought to have been defeated in a battle against Meliodas, aids Gilthunder and the Holy Knights against a powerful Gray Demon.

episodes.title: Where the Memories Lead
episodes.plot: An injured Diane awakens, having trouble remembering her comrades. with her memories fading she heads for Magedoza, home of the Giant Clan.

episodes.title: The Druids' Holy Land
episodes.plot: Meliodas and others head to Megadozer in hopes of finding Diane. Meanwhile, a confused Diane encounters Galand of the Ten commandments once again.

episodes.title: The Promise with the Loved One
episodes.plot: Acknowledging his lack of strength to face the Ten Commandments, Meliodas vigorously trains with the Druids of Istar to regain his sealed powers back.

episodes.title: What We Lacked
episodes.plot: Ban reflects on his past after returning to his childhood home in Ravens. Meliodas's allies train for their inevitable war with the ten commandments.

episodes.title: Father and Son
episodes.plot: A frail Zhivago reunites with Ban, his long lost adopted son. Meanwhile, a wary King confronts Meliodas about his true intentions.

episodes.title: Where Love is Found
episodes.plot: After a brief encounter with Meliodas, the ten commandments begin their attack on Britannia. A resurrected Elaine appears before Ban.

episodes.title: Farewell, My Beloved Thief
episodes.plot: A revived but possessed Elaine attacks Ban, as Melascula and Galand of the ten commandments emerge to destroy those in their path.

episodes.title: Master of the Sun
episodes.plot: Jericho carries severely injured Ban and Elaine on her back while escaping from Galand and Melascula before stumbling into a bar deep inside a cave.

episodes.title: A Horrifying Confession
episodes.plot: Gloxinia and Drole of the ten commandments lure strong fighters to Vaizel by offering to grant any wish to the winner of their Great Fight Festival.

episodes.title: Death Trap Labyrinth
episodes.plot: An elaborate trap-laden deadly maze constructed by Drole begins to weed out the weaker challengers that have gathered for the great fight festival.

episodes.title: Legendary Figures
episodes.plot: The surviving challengers of the great fight festival are split into pairs and made to face each other in a tag team battle.

episodes.title: For Whom Does That Light Shine
episodes.plot: King and Diane continue their battle against opponents summoned by Gloxinia and Drole. Escanor refuses to fight against his fellow ally Gowther.

episodes.title: Meliodas vs. The Ten Commandments
episodes.plot: The awakening of the ten commandments and beginning of the end of the kingdom of Britannia and the outbreak of the holy war. Now how will our heroes save Britannia from the hands of the ten commandments and from the demon lord.

episodes.title: In Search of Hope
episodes.plot: With Meliodas rendered powerless, Ban asks to be transported back so he can aid him in his fight against Estarossa and the other ten commandments.

episodes.title: Certain Warmth
episodes.plot: While caring for Meliodas, Elizabeth encounters a former Great Holy Knight thought to have perished long ago by the hands of Dreyfus and Hendrickson.

episodes.title: Return of the Sins
episodes.plot: With Ban and the holy knights paralyzed by Estarossa's powers, Escanor shows up to thwart the fall of Liones at the hands of the ten commandments.

episodes.title: The Hero Rises!
episodes.plot: As the situation inside Liones castle becomes even more dire, Merlin freed from Galand's commandment of truth, reappears in her former form.

episodes.title: As Long As You Are Here
episodes.plot: Determined to kill his former leader for betraying their clan 3,000 years ago, Fraudrin takes on a newly resurrected darker, more powerful Meliodas.

episodes.title: Kuroki Yume no Hajimari
episodes.plot: With the resumption of the capital and the recovery of the kingdom of Leonis, Meliodas, Elizabeth and Hawk turn their attention to the Boar Hat.

episodes.title: Futari no Ken'ka Matsuri
episodes.plot: Meliodas and Ban settle their differences in a fight festival. King Bartra has a disturbing vision. King and Howzer face off. Dreyfus talks to a shepherd boy and his father.

episodes.title: Hatsukoi o Oikakete
episodes.plot: King is thrilled to spend the day at the festival with Diane, but have difficulties figuring out how to take it to the next step.

episodes.title: Ai no Katachi
episodes.plot: Business at the Boar Hat is dropping, so Meliodas asks Merlin to join the staff as a waitress alongside Elizabeth and Diane to attract customers.

episodes.title: Nanatsu no Taizai
episodes.plot: A princess embarks on an adventure to gather a group of gentlemen who can take the despots of power and regain the freedom of the kingdom.

episodes.title: Seikishi no Ken
episodes.plot: When Gilthunder spiking his sword in the center of town and stops brewing, Meliodas is the one who can remove it and turns on the local hero.

episodes.title: Nemureru Morino Tsumi
episodes.plot: Meliodas, Hawk and Elizabeth go to a haunted forest where Meliodas faces great dangers in search of information.

episodes.title: Shojo no Yume
episodes.plot: Diane decides to join the mission to free Ben, but the group is attacked by an enemy you want to devastate the entire city.

episodes.title: Tatoe Anata ga Shindemo
episodes.plot: Golgius tries to recover the sword of Elizabeth and Meliodas. The sound of a mysterious bell causes infighting in the group.

episodes.title: Hajimari no Uta
episodes.plot: Elizabeth and Meliodas need the holy knights Friesia and Ruin sorted to get the dungeon. A harbinger indicates that a disaster on its way.

episodes.title: Kando no Saikai
episodes.plot: Ban, Meliodas and the others finally meet. In search of a clue to locate the Sin of Sloth, the group goes to the capital of the dead.

episodes.title: Osorubeki Tsuisekisha
episodes.plot: King and Ban has a decisive confrontation. Guila faces Meliodas, Diane and Elizabeth. Ban remembers Eliane and the fountain of youth.

episodes.title: Ankoku no Myakudo
episodes.plot: Eliane finally convinced King to rescue Meliodas and others. Back in the capital, Dissatisfaction causes dissension among some sacred gentlemen.

episodes.title: Baizeru Kenka Matsuri
episodes.plot: After find out what will be the grand prize of the festival, Gildeon, Meliodas Ban and King decide to participate, as well as the Knights Sacred Howzer and Griamore.

episodes.title: Sekinen no Omoi
episodes.plot: In the last match of the first stage of the festival, Ban recalled the first time she met Meliodas. Veronica and Griamore looking for Elizabeth.

episodes.title: Senritsu no Kanon
episodes.plot: The last match of the festival is interrupted by the attack of a group of Sacred Cavlheiros. For what?

episodes.title: Hakai no Shito
episodes.plot: Meliodas manages to break free and reappears, but he is different: it attacks its enemies and also their allies.

episodes.title: Hon o Yomu Hito
episodes.plot: Meliodas and his friends started a new search for the Seven Deadly Sins missing. The Gentleman Sacred Helbram sends killers to defeat the Giant Armed.

episodes.title: Anhoryi Naito
episodes.plot: Gowther appears after the counter attack and takes an unexpected attitude. Elizabeth finds out about the past Meliodas and Liz's existence.

episodes.title: Karitaterareru Densetsu-tachi
episodes.plot: The words of Elizabeth convince Meliodas to fight, and it was clear who dominated his mind. Hendrickson begins to resurrect the Demon Clan.

episodes.title: Saisho no Gisei
episodes.plot: When Elizabeth is kidnapped, Meliodas Ban and Gowther attack the capital. Meanwhile, King Arthur of Camelot confronts Hendrickson.

episodes.title: Kono Inochi ni Kaete mo
episodes.plot: Diane almost dies while trying to protect Zeal. Howzer and Guila are required to confront incredible magical powers.

episodes.title: Machiboke no Yoseio
episodes.plot: King remembers when he met Diana, 700 years ago, and the sad event between him and Helbram.

episodes.title: Yuki no Majinai
episodes.plot: To try to rescue Elizabeth, Meliodas joins Arthur and faces Hendrickson and Gilthunder in a difficult battle.

episodes.title: Ima, Soko ni Semaru Kyoi
episodes.plot: Merlin appears and ends with the plans of Vivian. Meliodas and Elizabeth station together again. Ban discovers will have to kill someone to Elaine rise again.

episodes.title: Kimi no Tame ni Dekiru Koto
episodes.plot: Meliodas Elizabeth lost again. Ban confronts the person he must kill to save Elaine. Diane and her group face the New Generation.

episodes.title: Zetsubo Korin
episodes.plot: Persecuted by the Seven Sins, Hendrickson makes two discoveries that give you great power.

episodes.title: Eiyu-tachi
episodes.plot: When the Seven Deadly Sins seem to be on the verge of defeat in a confrontation with Hendrickson, Elizabeth regains its power.
